#189376Bury Your Treasure.espNeoptolemusA role playing mod that allows you to dig a hole in any exterior cell to put your loot in. Simply purchase a shovel from any outfitter, equip it, and press attack while holding sneak. A 'hole' will appear at your feet which can be used as a container.[['Morrowind.esm', 79837557], ['Tribunal.esm', 4565686], ['Bloodmoon.esm', 9631798]]13Bury Your Treasure-43914-1-0.7zhttps://www.nexusmods.com/morrowind/mods/43914
